dialogueTree.title: Authority: "You made the right call there. It f..."
dialogueTree.text: You made the right call there. It feels good. Pure.

links.title: You: "About what?"
links.text: About what?

links.title: Authority: "I'm talking about your zero toleran..."
links.text: I'm talking about your zero tolerance policy toward *the mania of Narco*! You're in the *right* there. Powerful stance. Would you like to take it up a notch? Would you like to become an anti-narcomania zealot?

links.title: You: "I seem to have an absolutely *massi..."
links.text: I seem to have an absolutely *massive* speed habit myself... Is this really a good idea?

links.title: Authority: "That's *not* a problem. At all. The..."
links.text: That's *not* a problem. At all. The more drugs you do, the more zealous you can be in combating them. Drugs give you the *vigour* to fight drugs.

links.title: Rhetoric: "And not only that!"
links.text: And not only that!

links.title: You: "Yeah -- and the intimate knowledge..."
links.text: Yeah -- and the intimate knowledge of their damaging effects.

links.title: Authority: "Yeah. Sure."
links.text: Yeah. Sure.

links.title: You: "Isn't that a bit... stupid?"
links.text: Isn't that a bit... stupid?

links.title: Authority: "No."
links.text: No.

links.title: You: "I seem to have a slight speed habit..."
links.text: I seem to have a slight speed habit myself, though. Is this really a good idea?

links.title: You: "Okay, but don't I have to stop, lik..."
links.text: Okay, but don't I have to stop, like, taking pyrholidon first?

links.title: You: "I seem to have a drug habit or two..."
links.text: I seem to have a drug habit or two myself. Is this really a good idea?

links.title: You: "I am pure and steadfast. Totally un..."
links.text: I am pure and steadfast. Totally uncorrupted by Narco.

links.title: Authority: "Yes. You're pure. Unravaged by Narc..."
links.text: Yes. You're pure. Unravaged by Narco. Of course it's pretty obvious you've done a lot of drugs in the past -- and will probably do more in the future -- but that doesn't matter.

links.title: You: "Doesn't it hurt that I smoke like b..."
links.text: Doesn't it hurt that I smoke like beast?

links.title: Authority: "No. By supporting the *traditional*..."
links.text: No. By supporting the *traditional* tobacco industry, you keep the narco mills in check. If anything, you should smoke *more*. Tobacco smoke also wards off narco spirits.

links.title: You: ""I'm ready to start saving lives."..."
links.text: "I'm ready to start saving lives." (Opt in.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's good to hear." The lieutena..."
links.text: "That's good to hear." The lieutenant acknowledges your strange mumbling. He does not have any narcotics visibly on him as he says it. Good.

links.title: Authority: "You say the words loudly to yoursel..."
links.text: You say the words loudly to yourself. That makes them very convincing. The world applauds you -- you are finally on the holy warpath against narcomania!

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's wonderful to hear." The you..."
links.text: "That's wonderful to hear." The young woman takes a sip of coffee. Good un-narcotic coffee. Wholesome to look at.

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna pussy out at the last mo..."
links.text: "I'm gonna pussy out at the last moment, like a degenerate." [Discard thought.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?" The lieutenant waves you of..."
links.text: "What?" The lieutenant waves you off. "Never mind."

links.title: Authority: "Your words sound hollow and unconvi..."
links.text: Your words sound hollow and unconvincing. You're a weakling, a servant to the dark arts of narcomania.

links.title: Klaasje (Miss Oranje Disco Dancer): ""That's an odd thing to say to your..."
links.text: "That's an odd thing to say to yourself, officer." The young woman takes a sip of coffee. It does not seem to have narcotics in it.

links.title: You: "And my proclivity for smoking doesn..."
links.text: And my proclivity for smoking doesn't hurt?

links.title: You: "Me drinking -- moribundly -- that i..."
links.text: Me drinking -- moribundly -- that isn't gonna be a problem, is it?

links.title: Authority: "No. Alcohol is a powerful anti-narc..."
links.text: No. Alcohol is a powerful anti-narco agent. Seventy-eight percent of people who use alcohol daily feel no need to use it's opposite -- narcohol. If anything, you should drink more. It cleanses.

links.title: You: "My drinking problem... isn't going..."
links.text: My drinking problem... isn't going to be a problem, is it?

links.title: You: "You're right. I can't think of any..."
links.text: You're right. I can't think of any objections.

links.title: Authority: "Of course not. You've always been a..."
links.text: Of course not. You've always been anti-narco militant material. You kept *her* off a *dark* course with that interjection! Are you ready to *save lives*?

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
